originContent: **NOTE: ~~[http://www.easersoft.com]~~ The Domain Lost, This Is No Longer Offical Site.**
translatedContent: **NOTE: ~~[http://www.easersoft.com]~~ The Domain Lost, This Is No Longer Official Site.**

originContent: ExtremeCopy is a Windows utility which copy and move files extremely fast, it will auto optimize speed and resources base on target physical machine.
translatedContent: ExtremeCopy is a Windows utility which copies and moves files extremely fast, it will auto optimize speed and resources based on the target physical machine.

originContent: * Copy or move files or folders with extremely fast.
translatedContent: * Copy or move files or folders extremely fast.

originContent: * Increase the file copying speed up to 20% to 120% in comparison the default Windows copying function.
translatedContent: * Increase the file copying speed by 20% to 120% compared to the default Windows copying function.

originContent: * Save much time when backup huge files to another hard drive or USB drive.
translatedContent: * Save much time when backing up huge files to another hard drive or USB drive.

originContent: * Able to calculate and display remain time exactly.
translatedContent: * Able to calculate and display remaining time exactly.

originContent: * Supports Break Point which able to pause when encounters any problems such as file being locked and resume back with click on "Continue" button once the problem fixed.
translatedContent: * Supports Break Point which allows pausing when encountering any problems such as file being locked and resume back with a click on the "Continue" button once the problem is fixed.

originContent: For high performance purpose, all of code are written in C++ and using Win32 API directly.
translatedContent: For high performance purposes, all of the code is written in C++ and uses Win32 API directly.

originContent: ExtremeCopy uses email as bug report deliver to send dump file send to itself, setup your email account in **BugReport.cpp** if you want to use it.
translatedContent: ExtremeCopy uses email as bug report delivery to send dump files to itself, set up your email account in **BugReport.cpp** if you want to use it.

originContent: For legacy paid version, there is **RegisterCodeGenerator** project can generate register code for it.
translatedContent: For legacy paid versions, there is a **RegisterCodeGenerator** project that can generate register codes for it.
